downloadTitle: Kinect for Windows Developer Toolkit v1.5.1
downloadDescription: The Kinect for Windows Developer Toolkit contains source code samples, Kinect Studio, Face Tracking SDK, and other resources to simplify developing Kinect for Windows applications.
detailsSection:
The Kinect for Windows Developer Toolkit includes the following:
  • Source code samples
  • Kinect Studio
  • The Face Tracking SDK
  • Other valuable development resources
  • Note: The Kinect for Windows Developer Toolkit requires that the Kinect for Windows SDK v1.5 be installed
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows Embedded Standard 7


  • Hardware Requirements
    • 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor
    • Dual-core 2.66-GHz or faster processor
    • Dedicated USB 2.0 bus
    • 2 GB RAM
    • A Microsoft Kinect for Windows sensor


  • Software Requirements
    • Kinect for Windows SDK v1.5
installInstructionSection:
To install the Kinect for Windows Developer Toolkit:
  1. Make sure you have the Kinect for Windows SDK v1.5 installed
  2. From the download location, double-click on KinectDeveloperToolkit-v1.5.1-Setup.exe. This single installer works for both 32-bit and 64-bit Windows.
  3. To view the tools or samples, install stamples, or explore other resources, start the Developer Toolkit Browser via the start menu: Kinect for Windows SDK 1.5 -> Developer Toolkit Browser v1.5.1 (Kinect for Windows)
